name: Don't Shake Scott Morrison's Hand
description:
This game was made in less than 48 hours.

If you enjoy it let me know and if you donate I might make more

Don't Shake Scott Morrison's Hand

Includes 4 Exciting Boss Battle Levels

1 - Avoiding Scotts Laser Gaze!

2 - Don't Shake Scott Morrisons Hand!

3 - Look out! It's Scotts Tots!

4 - Scotts Farewell Hug

Final Score

Gameplay is approx 5 min, uses mouse control only
